title: BANDS x AIML Collab P2 â€“ How to Maintain a ML Portfolio
description: Part 2 of our collaboration with BANDS focuses on maintaining your ML portfolio and keeping it relevant.
content: Explore strategies for keeping projects relevant through newsletters, blogs, and competitions.
Learn to use platforms like Weights & Biases, DVC, Trello, and Evernote.
Hear from industry guest Albert Dai and participate in interactive sessions on portfolio management.
Stay current with ML trends and showcase your skills effectively.
